description:
"Serverless & Microservices Monitoring In An IoT World" by: Erez Berkner
Serverless technology is a great fit for IoT workloads, and indeed we witness a constant growth in usage. When you have many sensors that are very distributed and generate a high volume of invocations, monitoring and troubleshooting become a huge challenge. In this talk we will cover: 
- Why microservices, serverless & IoT devices are so difficult to monitor 
- Understand the current methods for making microservices, serverless & IoT applications observable 
- See best practices for monitoring microservices, serverless & IoT with real-world examples

Join us and gain back control over your IoT environment.

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
title: Serverless & Microservices Monitoring In An IoT World
